mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,
c.category_id,
RANK() OVER(ORDER BY search DESC) AS ranking
FROM ACCOMMODATE a
LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c USING(category_id)
LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT a.*,
c.category_id,
(SELECT img_path FROM ACCOIMG WHERE acco_rank = a.acco_rank LIMIT 1) img_path
,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ${acco} DESC) AS ranking
FROM ACCOMMODATE a
LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c USING(category_id)
WHERE city = #{city}
ORDER BY ${acco} DESC
LIMIT 3

SELECT a.*,
u.user_id, u.user_name,
i.acco_img_no AS acco_img_no, i.img_path AS img_path,
c.category_id
FROM ACCOMMODATE a
INNER JOIN USER u USING(user_id)
LEFT JOIN ACCOIMG i USING(acco_rank)
LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c USING(category_id)
WHERE acco_rank = #{accoRank}
